popup.title: Comments Insight
popup.noConfigHint: No scraper configuration found. Use AI to analyze and generate one.
popup.taskAlreadyRunning: Task is already in progress. Please wait for it to complete.

options.title: Settings
options.selectorCacheDescription: Saved successful selector configurations are shown here. When visiting the same website, cached selectors will be used first to avoid repeated AI analysis.
options.importedSuccess: Settings imported. Click Save to apply.
options.domAnalysisHint: Configure depth parameters for AI to analyze page structure when finding comment selectors (advanced options)
options.initialDepthHint: Initial depth for analyzing DOM tree (use lower values for simple pages, higher for complex nested structures)
options.expandDepthHint: Depth when exploring specific nodes (usually 2 is sufficient)
options.maxDepthHint: Maximum depth for full DOM structure analysis (use higher values for very complex pages)
options.placeholder_comments_json: The complete comments data structure in JSON format, including all comment fields like username, content, timestamp, likes, and nested replies. This is the main data source for analysis.
options.placeholder_datetime: The current date and time when the analysis is being performed. Format: ISO 8601 (e.g., 2024-01-15T10:30:00Z)
options.placeholder_video_time: The date and time when the video or post was originally published. Extracted from the page using the videoTime selector in scraper config. Helps understand comment trends over time.
options.placeholder_platform: The platform or domain where the comments were extracted from (e.g., youtube.com, twitter.com, reddit.com). This helps the AI understand platform-specific comment patterns and culture.
options.placeholder_url: The complete URL of the post or video being analyzed. This provides context about the source and can be used for reference in the analysis report.
options.placeholder_title: The title or headline of the post/video. This is crucial context for understanding what the comments are discussing and helps the AI provide more relevant analysis.
options.placeholder_total_comments: The total count of comments being analyzed (including all nested replies). This helps the AI understand the scale of engagement and adjust its analysis accordingly.

history.title: History
history.selectItem: Select an item to view details
history.exportCsvTooltip: Export all comments as CSV file
history.exportMarkdownTooltip: Export analysis report as Markdown file
history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
history.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history? This action cannot be undone!

scraper.title: Scraper Configurations
scraper.domainsHint: Enter domain names this configuration applies to (e.g., youtube.com)
scraper.urlPatternsHint: Regular expressions to match specific URLs (leave empty to match all URLs on the domain)
scraper.enableScrollHint: Enable if comments are lazy-loaded on scroll
scraper.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
scraper.noConfigsHint: Create a configuration to extract comments from websites, or use AI to generate one automatically
scraper.importConflictsHint: The following configurations conflict with existing ones. Please choose how to handle each conflict:

logs.empty: No logs found. Logs will appear here after operations.
logs.confirmClearLogs: Clear all logs? This cannot be undone!
